metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8927 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The trad_enc_decrypt_update function in archive_read_support_format_zip.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read and crash) via a crafted zip file, related to reading the password.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8927` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1').
